!confidential)
CHANCELLOR OF EXCHEQUER informed the Cabinet of the
proposals in his forthcoming Budget.
In accordance with precedent, details are not recorded in the
Cabinet Conclusions.
Summing up the discussion, the Prime Minister said that the
Cabinet warmly congratulated the Chancellor of the Exchequer cn
his Budget proposals, on which the press notices should be made
^?^yailable to colleagues as soon as possible after the Budget
<^^1he Cabinet -
vC^iook note, with approval, of the Chancellor of the
^\ Exchequer's Budget proposals and of the Prime Minister's
summing up of their discussion.
Cabinet Office
20 March 1990
